Address.label: Address
Address.value: 900 NORTH POINT PARKWAY,SUITE 200, ALPHARETTA, Georgia, 30005, United States

CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: Clearside Biomedical Inc is a United States-based clinical biopharmaceutical company. It is engaged in developing pharmacological therapies to treat blinding disease of the eye. The product candidates of the company focus on a disease affecting the retina and aim to restore or improve visual function primarily by reducing the macular edema associated with several diseases affecting vision.
